源码：
https://github.com/facebook/fresco

文档
http://fresco-cn.org/docs/index.html

demo:
https://github.com/liaohuqiu/fresco-demo-for-maven

--------------------------------------------------
maven.org
--------------------------------------------------
dependencies {
  compile 'com.facebook.fresco:fresco:0.6.0+'
}

http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails%7Ccom.github.theyy%7Cfresco%7C0.8.2%7Caar
